pkgmetadata.longdescription: Intra- and Inter-Regional Similarity // Calculates intra-regional and inter-regional similarities based on user-provided spatial vector objects (regions) and spatial raster objects (cells with values). Implemented metrics include inhomogeneity, isolation (Haralick and Shapiro (1985) doi:10.1016/S0734-189X(85)90153-7, Jasiewicz et al. (2018) doi:10.1016/j.cageo.2018.06.003), and distinction (Nowosad (2021) doi:10.1080/13658816.2021.1893324).
